name: sunbot
description: Serverless Discord bot that may or may not shine brighter than the sun (more than likely the latter)

scripts.deploy: npm install --only=prod && rm -f sunbot.zip && zip -r sunbot.zip . && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name sunbot --zip-file fileb://sunbot.zip && npm run register

author: David Scholberg <recombinant.vector@gmail.com>
